descriptionHtml:
[This is my first upload, it\'s only a save i know, but i\'m still learing how to mod :P]

Targus is a straight-forward level 8 Warrior, nothing really special here, but there\'s a list of items that he has in his inventory straight from the start.

The starting tutorial quest \"Unbound\" has been finished, and i\'ve already talked to Gurdur in Riverwood, so you can go straight to the Jarl of Whiterun or go explore!

Currently located at the three [3] guardian stones and you have equipment for a thief, mage and warrior at your disposal as shown below.

List of items;

Weapons
1x Hunting Bow (And 150 Iron Arrows)
2x Iron Dagger
2x Iron Sword
1x Iron Greatsword
2x Staff of Flames
1x Notched Pickaxe
1x Poacher\'s Axe


Armor
1x Fur Armor Set (Armor, boots, gloves & helm)
1x Iron Armor Set (Armor, boots, gloves & helm)
1x Robes of Destruction (15% reduction in destruction magicka use & +50% magicka egeneration)
1x Silver Necklace
1x Silver Ring
1x Hide Shield
1x Banded Iron Shield


Potions & Poisons
25x Potion of Minor Healing
25x Potion of Minor Magicka
25x Potion of Minor Stamina
10x Weak Paralysis Poison
10x Weak Magicka Poison
10x Weak Stamina Poison
10x Weak Poison [Health Damage]


Crafting Materials
5x Deer Hide
5x Wolf Pelt
15x Leather
15x Leather Strips
15x Iron Ore
15x Iron Ingot
15x Blue Butterfly Wing
15x Blue Mountain Flower
15x Red Mountain Flower


Miscellaneous Items
100x Lockpick
375x Gold
1x Knee Notice

Other Stuff
Most enchants learned & most alchemy ingredients have all four [4] properties revealed.  I\'ve also added ALL perks, except bribery under the speech tree.

All these items are in their most basic form, each one is lootable (Except the Psiijic stuff) and NOT enchanted in any way, shape or form.

It\'s not really a mod so do whatever you want with it, just don\'t accidentally delete it.

Feedback always welcome.

[Also, as a little treat, i\'ve added the Psiijic set too for those that want some good mage robes, it includes the robes, hood, & gloves]

-------------------------------

17:19 GMT - As requested by a commenter i\'ve decided to add another save without the added perks and enchant/alchemy discoveries, for a more, legitimate game.  Found the Psiijic boots too.  This will be in a SEPERATE file, the first one is as the description above describes.

The second file (Targus Level 1) will have all the same items, but not all the perks or enchant/alchemy discoveries.  So make your choice.

Your carrying capacity will be at 299/300, so pick what you want to play, and sell whatever is left over at the Riverwood Trader in Riverwood, i\'d suggest keeping hold of the Psiijic equipment, and the notched pickaxe & poacher\'s axe, since they\'re hard to get a hold of.

17:32 GMT - Uploaded \"Targus Level 1 Save\" which has no perks or enchant/alchemy discoveries.  Enjoy.
author: Wideload
